long_description: The REI Igneo Long shorts combine outdoor performance features with an urban attitude to keep you looking and feeling good on warm-weather adventures. Stretchy nylon/spandex fabric blend moves with you when you're on the go; fabric dries quickly and provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Articulated legs and a gusseted crotch allow unrestricted range of motion. 14 in. inseam places the hem just below the knee for extra coverage on wilderness excursions. 2 hand pockets, 2 zippered cargo pockets and a zippered back right pocket provide ample space for your everyday essentials; right front pocket has an interior coin pocket. Pocket interiors are made of mesh to drain moisture and allow cooling airflow. The REI Igneo Long shorts have a classic fit that is cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: The REI Igneo Long shorts combine outdoor performance features with an urban attitude to keep you looking and feeling good on warm-weather adventures.
